sn35.76:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.76:4.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.76:4.4: “Yaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.76:4.5: Kiñca, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo?
sn35.76:4.8: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ.
sn35.76:4.17: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ.
sn35.76:4.19: Yaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
